name: Project Chocoblip Demo
description:
Emulation graciously provided by RusticNES

(double click to enter full screen)

You went into the woods with your dad to get wood but got lost.
Find your way back home!

A cutesy platformer with metroidvania inspirations developed for the 2020/2021 NESDev competition.



Made with ❤️ by:

@josueferrol

@FredrikHathen

@CommodoreKulor

Instagram: @yoey.nsf

Instructions:

✜ Move (Arrow keys)

Ⓐ Jump (Z)

Press Ⓑ to enter aim mode,
release Ⓑ to shoot pom-pom (X).

While in aim mode, use ✜ to
pick your direction.
